name: Arcade Claw HD Lite
description:
Will the claw hold? Test your claw game skill! In this Lite version, try the stuffed animals crane machine! Earn credits to play for the mystery prizes!

Features:
- Authentic skill crane experience
- Real physics
- Beautiful 3D rendering
- Trophy room
- Different game modes
- Authentic claw machine sounds and fun background music!


********
UPGRADE TO THE FULL VERSION TO GET:
* TILT to move the claw - makes it much easier to get a high score!
* FOUR different machines with awesome prizes!
* TONS of new mystery prizes!
* SHAKE to move the toys in the machine!
********


Gameplay Tips:
* Swipe left, right, or down to change the view
* Double tap to bring up the pause screen
